name: Tank Wars (itch) (quo)
description:
This is a short shooting game for two players. You control the green tank with WSAD and the blue tank with arrow keys. The green tank shoots with the spacebar and the blue tank shoots with the enter key. You have one special bullet. A special bullet flies faster and deals two damage instead of one. The green tank shoots the special bullet with V and the blue tank shoots it with L. Your goal is to destroy the enemy tank or to get to the enemy base. 

This game was made in three days on the GameCamp 2018
